Director, Radio and Television
University of Tennessee
3 March 1961
Dr. Samuel L. Becker, Director
Division of Television, Radio, Film
Television Center,
State University of Iowa,
609 10th Avenue,
Iowa City, Iowa.
Dear Sam:
I was sorry that you could not be at the meeting of the
Advisory Committee in Washington last Monday. However,
following your suggestion Bruce Westley attended and was
of considerable help to us.
I have asked him to make a report to you but I am also enclosing
a Memorandum of the meeting which I thoughTyou might like to
see . Any comments or suggestions you have will be appreciated.
I will get in touch with you later about the Purdue meeting.
At the present time I think it may be held on 2 0 and 21st. In
any event, if I can arrange things I will get in touch with you.
Enclosures
VB:jph
